Package com.example.mental.rpgo

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AboutUs
    Contains the About us Activity.
    AchivementObject
    Contains the achivement object with it's attributes.
    Achivements
    Contains the Achivement activity.
    Buttons
    This is the main menu of the application.Contains the Buttons activity.
    CharSetUp
    This class handles the character icon selection from the user, and stores the icon into the database
    DatabaseHelper
    This class provides all the required functions and information about the database.
    Forgot_password
    This class handles the Forgot Password functionality.
    gameWin
    This class simply loads the activity when the user has successfully solved all riddles and finished the game
    Global
    This class stores all the global variables and their corresponding functions required thoughout the application
    grifoi
    This class inclues all the logic behild the riddles and their solution.
    IntroSequenceActivity
    This class handles the tutorial for all the new users.
    Keys
    This class handles the Keys and their location.
    MainActivity
    This is the MainActivity, it is the first class to be called everytime the application starts It is the login screen of the application and handles all the logic behild it
    Map
    This class handles the Map section.
    sack
    This class handles the inventory system of the user
    Scanner
    This class handles the QR Scanner, opens the camera of the smartphone and tries to recognize the QR code given.
    SignUp
    This class witch handles the sign up of the user
